title: 【治愈】Hi Stranger-英文原音中文字幕
abstract:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZvMdMjAQSk
源地址：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZvMdMjAQSk
字幕：自制@奇爱艺术疗养院
comments: 感觉好暖，“他画我的时候我动都不敢动”
是我太寂寞了吗？居然真的觉得很戳很感动啊
好喜欢他画我的时候那个眼神！

Hi, Stranger. It’s been a while. I miss you. It’s OK. You can look my butt. I feel like I can really be vulnerable around you. Do you like this tree I made? Cool, right? I think it’s cool.It’s so hard to make things sometimes, you know. It just takes so much mental energy, and it’s so tired. I just want to stay here and relax with you.Wow, check out the sunset.So nice to stop, and take all this in.It makes you enjoy being alive.Even you.I love looking at you.I want remember all your shapes.Ah, beautiful.I’ve been thinking about you a lot lately. I see you trying to do so many things at once,worrying about the decisions you made,worrying that you said wrong things to someone.You’re so hard on yourself.But you’re wonderful, and worthy being loved.You really are.You just have to let yourself believe it.Well, I know you are busy, and probably have to go.But I’m glad to see you for a minute.I love you.
